org.nmdp.ngs.tools

Class FilterConsensus

    public final class FilterConsensus
extends Object

    Filter consensus sequences into subregions of research or clinical interest.

    • Constructor Detail

      • FilterConsensus

        public FilterConsensus(File bamFile,
               File bedFile,
               File outputFile,
               String gene,
               boolean cdna,
               boolean removeGaps,
               double minimumBreadth,
               int expectedPloidy)
        Filter consensus sequences into subregions of research or clinical interest.
        Parameters:
        bamFile - input BAM file of consensus sequences, must not be null
        bedFile - input BED file of genomic regions, must not be null
        outputFile - output FASTA file, if any
        gene - gene, must not be null
        cdna - cdna, true to output cdna from the same contig (phased consensus sequence) in FASTA format (for interpretation)
        removeGaps - remove alignment gaps in the filtered consensus sequence
        minimumBreadth - minimum breadth, must be in range [0.0 - 1.0]
        expectedPloidy - expected ploidy, must be > 0
